title: Colombia Protests: Police Force, Built for War, Finds a New One
content:
1. Colombia Protests: Police Force, Built for War, Finds a New One  The New York Times
  2. Death toll from Colombia protests rises to 42, says human rights investigator  FRANCE 24 English
  3. Colombian protest leader Lucas Villa, who was shot eight times, dies  CNN
  4. Colombia protests enter third week with national strike  Reuters Australia
  5. Colombia protests continue in Cali as death toll climbs to 42 | AFP  AFP News Agency
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
